duties_responsibilities.duty: Verify employee timesheets and ensure correct entries such as work hours, leaves, and other records while being able to reconcile if needed.
Ensure all payroll processes comply with state, federal, and local payroll systems.
Serve as the primary point of contact for employee payroll related questions.
Run required reports associated with payroll, labor relations, and maintenance of benefits.
Assist internal employees with payroll and benefit related questions.
Assist the Human Resources department with open enrollment.
